sen.j: 中村 翫雀（なかむら かんじゃく）は、歌舞伎の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Kanjaku NAKAMURA is a professional name of Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors).
Kanjaku NAKAMURA is a professional name of Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors).
Kanjaku NAKAMURA is a professional name of Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors).

sen.j: 現在でも上方系と認識されている名跡である。
sen.e: It is a professional name that recognized as Kamigata (Kyoto and Osaka area) line even at present.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: It is a professional name that recognized as Kamigata (Kyoto and Osaka area) line even at present.

sen.j: 四代目中村歌右衛門の系統から中村鴈治郎家に伝えられて現在に至る。
sen.e: It was passed down from line of Utaemon NAKAMURA the fourth to Ganjiro NAKAMURA family, and passed down till present.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処

sen.j: 鴈治郎との関係から「がんじゃく」と読む人もいるが、本来はにごらない。
sen.e: Because of the relation with Ganjiro, some people read 'Ganjaku', but originally it has not a sonant sound.
Because of the relation with Ganjiro, some people read 'Ganjaku', but originally it has not a sonant sound.

sen.j: - 中村歌右衛門 (4代目)の俳名。
sen.e: Haimyo (also known as Haimei) (the term originally refers to a pen name as a haiku poet, but it also refers to a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) of Utaemon NAKAMURA (the fourth).

sen.j: - 1834年生まれ、初名は市川橘蔵、その後坂東橘蔵を経て1852年に2代目を継ぐ。
sen.e: He was born in 1834, his original name was Kichizo ICHIKAWA, and he succeeded to the second after succession to Kichizo BANDO.

sen.j: 俗に俳名の菊善から「菊善 翫雀」という。
